title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 8.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 8.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Section
502
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law provides that an applicant for a license shall pass
an examination as to his qualifications as the commissioner shall require. This

Part sets forth the general rules governing the waiver of road test, which is
one of the required examinations. In addition to the general waiver rules
herein contained, additional rules governing the waiver of road tests are set
forth in Part 3 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
8.1

Amended, New

York State Register August 27, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 34, eff. 8/27/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
